# outlierz

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of outlierz is to make it easy to find outliers in variables with
the z-score method. This method is frequently used in (introductory) statistics
and the currently taught workarounds involve many steps and are error-prone.

## Installation

This module is in an early development stage and is not available from the
jamovi library. If you already want to give it a try, sideload the .jmo file
as a jamovi module.
